markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Fulminating Spear](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1087)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_ is warm to the touch. The head of the spear is crafted from gold with ivory inlay and has a ruby set into the shaft. You can make the spear glow like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) or suppress its light by using an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

<document level="2" id="action-885" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fulminating Spear
